attributes.action: ensure long-term unemployed contribute to society by way of community/national service or unskilled work to earn benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would mean benefits are earned and also give valuable work experience to those without it. It would encourage people to look for jobs if they know they will be required to work for benefits. Those under 25 with no work experience should complete 3 years national service with the possibility of trade training in one of the armed forces.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
